data.title: Music: Mike Herrera: "Secret Weapon" and "The Final Slowdance"
data.meta_description: MxPx frontman Mike Herrera recently sat down with Dying Scene and recorded a pair of acoustic songs: "Secret Weapon" from the 2007 album of the same name, and "The Final Slowdance" from 1998's Slowly Going the Way of the Buffalo.  ...
data.text: MxPx frontman Mike Herrera recently sat down with Dying Scene and recorded a pair of acoustic songs: "Secret Weapon" from the 2007 album of the same name, and "The Final Slowdance" from 1998's Slowly Going the Way of the Buffalo.
